Name:
Handling of autosaved projects*
*defines how to load autosaved projects (if present) when using load command. 
More information about Autosave feature here.
Clear cache on exit
Value: 999999 – Do not clear cache, 0 – Clear all cache items, 3 – Items older than 3 days, 7 – Items older than 1 week, 14 – Items older than 2 weeks, 30 – Items older than 1 month, 90 – Items older than 3 months

Name: UI Language
Value: 2052 - Chinese (simplified), 1028 - Chinese (traditional), 1029 – Czech, 1033 – English, 1036 – French, 1031 – German, 1040 – Italian, 1041 – Japanese, 1042 – Korean, 3082 - Spanish

Name: Enable automatic renewal of license activation
Default value: true (when activating the license via the activate command)

Name: Add a reconstruction region after alignment
Distortion model
Value: Division Brown3 Brown4 Brown3WithTangential2 Brown4WithTangential2 KplusBrown3WithTangential2 KplusBrown4WithTangential2

Name: Prefer images as feature source during import of Z+F laser scans
Image downscale
Type: Image depth map calculation - Preview model

Name: Image downscale
Type: Image depth map calculation - Normal model

Name: Mesh calculaton strategy
Value: sfm – Use sparse point cloud, vertexCount - Max vertex count

Name:
Texel size*
*relevant for: "unwrapStyle=FixedTexelSize"
Value: 0 – Optimal, 1 - 2x optimal (50% texture quality), 2 - 4x optimal (25% texture quality), 3 - 10x optimal (10% texture quality), 4 - 100x optimal (1% texture quality), 5 - Custom
1 – 2x optimal (50% texture quality), 2 – 4x optimal (25% texture quality), 3 – 10x optimal (10% texture quality), 4 – 100x optimal (1% texture quality), 5 - Custom

Name:
Custom minimal required texel size*
*relevant for: "unwrapStyle=FixedTexelSize"
"unwrapFixedTexelSizeType =5"

Maximal required texel size*
*relevant for: "unwrapStyle=AdaptiveTexelSize"
Value: 0 – Optimal, 1 – 2x optimal (50% texture quality), 2 – 4x optimal (25% texture quality), 3 – 10x optimal (10% texture quality), 4 – 100x optimal (1% texture quality), 5 - Custom

Name:
Custom maximal required texel size*
*relevant for: "unwrapStyle=FixedTexelSize"
"unwrapFixedTexelSizeType =5"
Coloring image layer
Default value:
geometry (if no texturing layer is present)
texture01 (if any texturing layer is present)
